Team6 Project - Street Risk Predictor

App module

App.check_if_saved_models_exist()[source]

Check if saved models exist and update the Streamlit session state.

Returns:

bool: True if models exist, False otherwise.

App.create_map(data, averaged_data)[source]

Create a map with markers based on the input data.

Args:

data (DataFrame): Input data. averaged_data (DataFrame): Preprocessed data with risk levels.

Returns:

folium.Map: Folium map with markers.

App.get_model_features_path(model_name)[source]

Get the file path for the features of a given model.

Args:

model_name (str): Name of the model.

Returns:

str: Path to the model features file.

App.get_model_path(model_name)[source]

Get the file path for a given model name.

Args:

model_name (str): Name of the model.

Returns:

str: Path to the model file.

App.load_model(model_path)[source]

Load a model from a given file path.

Args:

model_path (str): Path to the model file.

Returns:

model: Loaded model.

App.main()[source]

Main function to run the Streamlit app.

App.plot_map()[source]

Plot the map with risk levels for streets using Folium and Streamlit.

App.preprocess_data(data, model_features, is_n_network)[source]

Preprocess the input data for model prediction.

Args:

data (DataFrame): Input data. model_features (list): List of model features. is_n_network (bool): Flag indicating if the model is a neural network.

Returns:

DataFrame: Preprocessed data.

App.read_model_features(model_path)[source]

Read model features from a file.

Args:

model_path (str): Path to the model features file.

Returns:

list: List of model features.
